pkgmetadata.longdescription: WMMemMon is a program to monitor memory/swap usages. It is a dockapp that is supported by X window managers such as Window Maker, AfterStep, BlackBox, and Enlightenment. The current memory usage is displaied as the outside pie-slices. The swap usage is represented by the inside slices. It has an LCD look-alike user interface. The back light may be turned on/off by clicking the mouse button over the appliacation.
